overview: Sam has over 15 years of top-tier management consulting, multi-national operating and entrepreneurial business development experience. He is a former management consultant with McKinsey & Company (USA) where he served leading global industrial, VC and PE clients. He has worked in senior business development, strategy, technical and operations management positions with Shell, BP, ICI, Exxon and Dr Mehta Hospitals in Europe, Latin America and Asia. Over his career, he has held many senior leadership positions within various family businesses including healthcare, food manufacturing and trading. He is a graduate of the Kellogg School of Management, Northwestern University. He is also a Chartered Chemical Engineer (CEng), Professional European Engineer (EUR ING), a Chartered Scientist (CSci) and a Chartered Global Environmentalist (CEnv). He is a Sainsbury Management Fellow (SMF) and a TIE Charter Member.
